pl.szczurowsky.ratorm

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.szczurowsky.ratorm.Database
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MongoDB

    public abstract class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstraction for database. Provides core methods for all database types
